name: tm29
effect: Teaches Psychic to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Psychic to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The foe is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the foe’s Sp. Def stat.
